description: This file defines a Dart class 'StockRating' which models the rating information for a stock, including fields such as symbol, score, traffic light indicator, and rationale. It includes factory constructors for creating instances based on momentum and mock data.

classes.name: StockRating
classes.description: A data class representing a stock's rating, including its symbol, score, traffic light status, and rationale.

methods.name: StockRating.fromMomentum
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a StockRating instance based on stock momentum represented by change percentage.

methods.name: StockRating.mock
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a mock StockRating with default values.
